questions.text: How clearly do you understand the concepts presented in this tutorial?
How excited are you to continue learning about the Decentralized Web?
Do you know where to go next in your learning journey?

thankYouMessage.title: Thank you!
thankYouMessage.text:
Have a few more minutes to help us out?

We've created a two-minute survey to learn more about our users so we can better meet your needs.
